info.title: Simbat API Documentation
info.description: API documentation for Simbat Pharmacy Management System

400.description: Unable to send password reset link

422.description: Cannot delete category with existing drugs
Cannot delete drug with existing stock

parameters.name: variant
parameters.description: Type of record to search (bill, retur, trash)

422.description: Return is already completed or validation error

get.description: Returns a paginated list of manufacturers with optional search functionality

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term for manufacturer name or code

post.description: Creates a new manufacturer with a unique code

get.description: Returns detailed information about a specific manufacturer

put.description: Updates the details of an existing manufacturer

delete.description: Deletes a manufacturer if it has no associated drugs

422.description: Cannot delete manufacturer with existing drugs

get.description: Search manufacturers by name or code
Returns a paginated list of drug repacks with optional search and filtering

post.description: Creates a new drug repack with calculated price based on drug's base price and margin

422.description: Validation error or drug has no price set

get.description: Returns detailed information about a specific repack

put.description: Updates the margin and recalculates the price of an existing repack

422.description: Validation error or drug has no price set

delete.description: Deletes a repack if it is not a default repack and has no existing stock

422.description: Cannot delete default repack or repack with existing stock

get.summary: Get top selling items for a period

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of top items to return

403.description: Unauthorized - Only super admin can access
Unauthorized - Only super admin can create users
Unauthorized - Only super admin can access
Unauthorized - Only super admin can update users
Unauthorized - Only super admin can delete users

get.description: Returns a paginated list of drug variants with optional search functionality
Returns detailed information about a specific variant

put.description: Updates the details of an existing variant

delete.description: Deletes a variant if it has no associated drugs

422.description: Cannot delete variant with existing drugs

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term for vendor name, phone, or address

422.description: Cannot delete vendor with existing drugs

message.example: Cannot delete vendor with existing drugs

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search query for vendor name, phone, or address
